name: Hi-TechLPO
tag_list: legal-process-outsourcing, legal-support-providers, litigation-support-services, outsourcing-legal-support, lpo, lpo-company-india
overview:
Hi-Tech LPO, ISO: 9001 Certified Legal Process Outsourcing Support Provider in India. Provide Practice Management Systems & Legal Process Outsourcing (LPO) for small to medium sized law firms, attorneys, and corporate legal departments.

Service Offered: Litigation Support Legal Research Immigration law support Contracts Management Deposition Summaries / Indexing Trial transcript summary writing Legal Transcription Family law support Large Scale Document Coding Patent Search services Patent proof reading Due Diligence and Competitive Intelligence Document Review Document Drafting Contract management Legal proofreading E-Discovery Paralegal Support Services Healthcare Legal Support Services Bankruptcy support and others

Expert Legal Support Services that helps legal professionals, firms save time, improve profit and cut-cost. Let professional legal support service provider’s help you do best what you do best- practice law.

Website: http://www.hitechlpo.com Email: info@hitechlpo.com
